pr_title: [TE] enchance anomaly api to propagate feedback

timeline.message: [TE] enchance anomaly api to propagate feedback

timeline.bodyText: we may need to consider the potential merging gap between the parent and children anomaly.
timeline.author: jihaozh

timeline.bodyText: Hi Vincent, is the same API used for both anomalies page, root cause page, application page and potentially alert page? Let's make sure the consistent behavior, if users update the children anomalies' feedback from any page above, it will always propagate the feedbacks to the parent anomaly?
timeline.author: cecilynie
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -156,30 +156,49 @@ public MergedAnomalyResultDTO getMergedAnomalyDetail(
    *                        eg. payload
    *                        <p/>
    *                        { "feedbackType": "NOT_ANOMALY", "comment": "this is not an anomaly" }
+   * @param propagate       : a flag whether it should propagate the same feedback value to the parent of this anomaly
+   *                        and all its siblings if they exist
    */
   @POST
   @Path(value = "anomaly-merged-result/feedback/{anomaly_merged_result_id}")
   @ApiOperation("update anomaly merged result feedback")
-  public void updateAnomalyMergedResultFeedback(@PathParam("anomaly_merged_result_id") long anomalyResultId,
+  public void updateAnomalyMergedResultFeedback(
+      @PathParam("anomaly_merged_result_id") long anomalyResultId,
+      @QueryParam("propagate") @DefaultValue("true") boolean propagate,

replies.bodyText: I confirm that updating feedbacks in anomaly pages, root cause pages, application pages and alert pages will trigger this API call. I don't think there is any other page where we can update the feedback.
replies.author: vincentchenjl

timeline.bodyText: Hi Vincent, just a quick question, where is the sibling anomaly updated? Thanks!
timeline.author: jasonyanwenl

replies.bodyText: anomalyMergedResultDAO.updateAnomalyFeedback(anomaly) actually updates the feedback labels of anomaly and all its child anomaly.
replies.author: vincentchenjl
